ContactPointPhone.name: ContactPointPhone
ContactPointPhone.description: Represents a contact’s phone number, which is associated with an individual or person account.

ActiveFromDate.description: The date when the contact’s phone number became active.

ActiveToDate.description: The date when the contact’s phone number is no longer active.

AreaCode.description: The area code of the phone number’s location for the contact.

BestTimeToContactEndTime.description: The latest time to contact the individual.

BestTimeToContactStartTime.description: The earliest time to contact the individual.

BestTimeToContactTimezone.description: The timezone applied to the best time to contact the individual.

ExtensionNumber.description: The phone number extension for the contact.

FormattedInternationalPhoneNumber.description: The internationally recognized format for the contact’s phone number.

FormattedNationalPhoneNumber.description: The nationally recognized format for the contact’s phone number.

IsBusinessPhone.description: Indicates whether a contact’s phone number is a business number (true) or not (false).

IsFaxCapable.description: Indicates whether a contact’s phone number is a fax number (true) or not (false).

IsPersonalPhone.description: Indicates whether a contact’s phone number is a personal number (true) or not (false).

IsPrimary.description: Indicates whether a contact’s phone number is their primary number (true) or not (false).

IsSmsCapable.description: Indicates whether a contact’s phone number can receive text messages (true) or not (false).

LastReferencedDate.description: The timestamp for when the current user last viewed a record related to this record.

LastViewedDate.description: The timestamp for when the current user last viewed this record. If this value is null, it’s possible that this record was referenced (LastReferencedDate) and not viewed.

Name.description: Required. The name of the contact point phone record.

OwnerId.description: The ID of the account’s owner associated with this contact.

ParentId.description: The ID of the contact’s parent. Only an individual or account can be a contact’s parent.

PhoneType.description: The type of phone number for the contact.

PreferenceRank.description: Specify how this phone numbers ranks in terms of preference among the contact’s other phone numbers.

TelephoneNumber.description: Required. The phone number for the contact.

UsageType.description: Specify the usage type of this number. For instance, whether it’s a work phone or a home phone.
